shouldInheritFromParent.description:
Gets or sets whether Actionable Remediation settings can be updated from a parent.

If true or null, updates on a parent also update this resource.
If false, only force updates will update this reource.

ActionableRemediationState.description:
ActionableRemediation Setting.
None - the setting was never set.
Enabled - ActionableRemediation is enabled.
Disabled - ActionableRemediation is disabled.

orgs.description: Gets or sets org onboarding information.

code.description:
Gets or sets one-time OAuth code to exchange for refresh and access tokens.

Only used during PUT operations. The secret is cleared during GET.
In general, RPaaS does not return any property marked as a secret.

value.description: Gets or sets list of resources.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next link to scroll over the results.

GitHubConnectorProperties.description: Properties of the ARM resource for /subscriptions/xxx/resourceGroups/xxx/providers/Microsoft.SecurityDevOps/gitHubConnectors.

code.description:
Gets or sets one-time OAuth code to exchange for refresh and access tokens.

Only used during PUT operations. The secret is cleared during GET.
In general, RPaaS does not return any property marked as a secret.

value.description: Gets or sets list of resources.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next link to scroll over the results.

name.description: Gets or sets name of the GitHub Org.

installationName.description: Gets or sets gitHub owner url.

installationId.description: Gets or sets gitHub installation id.

value.description: Gets or sets list of resources.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets next link to scroll over the results.

repoId.description: Gets or sets GitHub Repo Id.

repoName.description:
Gets or sets GitHub Repo Name.
Eg: "new-repo-1".

repoFullName.description:
Gets or sets GitHub Full Name.
Repository name, prefixed with installation name.
Eg: "contosoenterprise/new-repo-1".

branchNames.description: Gets or sets branches that should have annotations.

annotateDefaultBranch.description: Gets or sets whether default branch of Repo should be annotated.
